__e: Let me emphasise, Odo, that I haven't given up hope, and you mustn't either.
Forgive me, Odo. I should've told you the truth about myself.
Odo, I hope you know how much I... lf l don't want pity from the woman I love, why would I want it from you?
Odo to the Captain. Go ahead, Constable.
The Medical Bay's all set but it'll take a little while to get Odo on board.
